item.description:
Kelle Sparta, Thought Alchemist of The Divining Room & presenter at our June Meetup, is back with us, this time on the phone, on how to increase your attractiveness.

Bring your burning questions re:

- how to AMP UP being a more compellingly attractive person &

- any other LoA-related questions you might have 

Thank you very much, Kelle, for your gift of wisdom & time this evening.

 

WHEN: 8:00 - 9:00 PM EST
(Call in by 7:55pm. We begin promptly at 8 pm )

WHERE: Telephone Bridge Number: 1 (218) 486-1616
Access Code: 8717419#

Note: This is a long distance call; not toll-free.
Please do not give out the telephone bridge number to other

 
Tele-Etiquettes for everyone's enjoyment on call:

i) Preference is to use a regular land phone rather than a cell or mobile phone
ii) Be in a quiet place, away from "happy" background noises - pets, kids, tv etc.
iii) Identify yourself when you share
iv) Actively participate

*******************************************************

About Kelle Sparta:
www.TheDiviningRoom.com
email: kelle@thediviningroom.com 

Kelle Sparta is a practicing shaman & tantrika with over 30 years of personal growth & development experience. She has been described as a “force of nature” & a “goddess incarnate”. Clients have referred to working with her as “entering the SpartaSphere – the place of multi-dimensional thought that opens doorways to new ways of being in the world.” She works with individuals & couples on both an energetic & practical level to find that place of strength & power within that allows you to have everything you ever wanted – in life, in love, & in community

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: TELE-Meetup: Mastermind with Kelle Sparta: AMP UP Your Attractiveness
